document.full_text: britney spears has confirmed she will perform a "surprise" concert in las vegas friday night at the palms casino resort rain nightclub, which will be filmed for an upcoming mtv special.
document.title: britney spears confirms "surprise" vegas concert
lines_and_colors: britney spears has confirmed she will perform a "surprise" concert in las vegas friday night at the palms casino resort rain nightclub, which will be filmed for an upcoming mtv special.
